This is NTSC! How do I convert this to PAL without going beyond one DVD per movie?
Burning this iso to dvd does not playback on my PAL player.

Found the solution! Extract the iso, do not burn (use PowerIso or Isobuster). Burn the extracted files with DVD Shrink 3.2. This dvd will play on a PAL player.

To Lagavulin69: next time post your solution instead of merely boasting you found it.
I burned the ISO files to the 2 DVD's and they will only play on any computer. My 3 DVD players all say "Cannot play this format." Please help. I thought the format was NTSC??
